title: Dahua Yueya Chuan
synopsis: The complete cartoon of The Big Story Crescent Ship is a large-scale Hunan native animated feature film with adventure and funny selling points. For the funny version of "Marco Polo's Travels", with a relaxed smile, you will also do Marco Polo without knowing it, and tour most of the world. (translated from youku)
